caption.center: Dora Lillian RUSSUM v. John Robert RUSSUM, Sr.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Rankin County; Billy G. Bridges, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
John L. Kearney, Pine Bluff, Ark., for appellant.
Jerry T. Johnston, Johnston, Adams Younger, Brandon, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PATTERSON, C.J., and SUGG and WALKER, JJ.
